title: Game Progress Route
content:
derstanding. Your duty is to maintain peace, not escalate conflicts. Your uniform should suffice to pacify them.

Choose the fourth option, and Rowan conveys his concern that if no action is taken, more casualties will accumulate. He believes refugees have taken advantage of the city for too long. He'll ask if you'd join him in eliminating the refugees. Respond with:

They're innocent people. You can't simply kill them! Both sides could benefit from a lesson: Let's address the issue comprehensiv
